changes: Fixed sorting order when patch titles contain numbers (now matches only 4+ digit sequence numbers)
Fixed sorting exception on some file name formats
Metadata files are now copied to .hackorum/ before applying patches, so they are preserved even on error
Fixed patch file sorting for files with prefixes (e.g., nocfbot.v2-0005-subject.patch now sorts by sequence number)
Improved base commit detection using submission date from archive metadata
Added --verbose option for detailed base commit detection debugging
Copy extracted patch files and metadata to .hackorum/ directory for inspection
Added version check to notify users of updates
Added support for base-commit line from git format-patch --base
Added support for .diff files (applied with git apply and committed individually)
Fixed base commit detection for --force re-application and multi-patch series
